alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:08AM CDT until June 16 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rapides Parish in central Louisiana... Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 308 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of Olla to 7 miles north of Flatwoods, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Marksville, Simmesport, Boyce, Moreauville, Bordelonville, Alexandria International Airport, Effie, Lena, Ball, Cottonport, Mansura, Hessmer, Plaucheville, Tioga, Timber Trails, Esler Regional Airport, Flatwoods and Lake Ophelia National Wildlife Refuge. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 76 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
